tool_description: Look up geographical location by IP address.
name: Ipapi
title: Ipapi

api_list.name: getIPAddressLocation
api_list.description: This endpoint retrieves location for the IP address specified

api_list.name: getMyIPAddressLocation
api_list.description: This endpoint retrieves location for your IP address.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://Ipapistefan-skliarovV1.p.rapidapi.com/getMyIPAddressLocation"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "Ipapistefan-skliarovV1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://Ipapistefan-skliarovV1.p.rapidapi.com/getMyIPAddressLocation"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "Ipapistefan-skliarovV1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: getSingleInfoForIP
api_list.description: This endpoint retrieves a specific location field for the IP address provided in the URL.

required_parameters.name: fieldName
required_parameters.description: Possible values: ip, city, region, country, postal, latitude, longitude, timezone, latlong

api_list.name: getSingleInfoForMyIP
api_list.description: This endpoint retrieves a specific location field for your IP address.

required_parameters.name: fieldName
required_parameters.description: Possible values: ip, city, region, country, postal, latitude, longitude, timezone, latlong
